post.title: ces 2012: panasonics new range for 2012.
post.content: hi all. this thread will contain all the latest links i get from mark. there is also now a stickie that contains all the plasma related links. at the moment this includes lgs latest sets. i will be adding links as i get them. ces 2012: panasonic plasma tv line-up for 2012 ces 2012: panasonic introduces myspace tv for smart viera ces 2012: panasonic (don't really) show off new tv range ces 2012: bang olufsen's new 3d tv
